subsection.name: How to build and run the examples under Jetty

ol.li: Install Java 1.4.x or up, Ant 1.6 or Maven 1.x and Jetty
Go to WICKET_HOME and type "ant" or - if you use Maven
Go to JETTY_HOME and type "java -jar start.jar"

subsection.name: How to build and run the examples under Tomcat

ol.li: Install Java 1.4.x or up, Ant 1.6 or Maven and Tomcat 5.0
